item.text: Are we beginning to commend ourselves again? We don’t need letters of recommendation to you or from you as some other people do, do we?

You <st data-num="4771" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1449" class="">written</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>, <st data-num="1097" class="">known</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st>,
revealing that you are a letter of Christ, delivered by us, written not with ink but by the Spirit of the living God, not on stone tablets but on tablets of human hearts.
Now we have such confidence in God through Christ.

<st data-num="3756" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">adequate</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st> to <st data-num="3049" class="">consider</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> if it were coming <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2426" class="">adequacy</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,
who made us adequate to be servants of a new covenant not based on the letter but on the Spirit, for the letter kills, but the Spirit gives life.

But if the ministry that produced death—carved in letters on stone tablets—came with glory, so that the Israelites could not keep their eyes fixed on the face of Moses because of the glory of his face (a glory which was made ineffective),

<st data-num="4459">how much</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glorious</st> will the <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st>?<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> there was <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> in the <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st> that produced <st data-num="2633" class="">condemnation</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183">how much</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> does the <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st> that produces <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4052" class="">excel</st><n id="3" /> in <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2532">indeed</st>, what had been <st data-num="1392" class="">glorious</st> now<n id="1" /> has <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="1752">because of</st> the <st data-num="5235">tremendously greater</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of what replaced it.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> what was <st data-num="2673" class="">made ineffective</st><n id="1" /> came <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>, <st data-num="4183">how much</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> has what <st data-num="3306" class="">remains</st><n id="3" /> come <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>!

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st>, since we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5108" class="">such</st> a <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st>, we <st data-num="5530" class="">behave</st> with <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">boldness</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2509" class="">like</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> who used to <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> a <st data-num="2571" class="">veil</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4383" class="">face</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> keep the <st data-num="5207 2474">Israelites</st><n id="1" /> from <st data-num="816" class="">staring</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">result</st><n id="3" /> of the glory that was <st data-num="2673">made ineffective</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3540" class="">minds</st> were <st data-num="4456" class="">closed</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="891" class="">to</st> this <st data-num="4594" class="">very</st> <st data-num="2250">day</st>, the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="2571" class="">veil</st> <st data-num="3306">remains</st> when they hear the <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st> <st data-num="1242" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="320" class="">read</st>.<n id="2" /> It has <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="343" class="">removed</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> only <st data-num="1722">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> is it <st data-num="2673">taken away</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> this <st data-num="4594">very day</st> <st data-num="2259" class="">whenever</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> is <st data-num="314" class="">read</st>, a <st data-num="2571" class="">veil</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">lies</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">minds</st>,<n id="1" />
but when one turns to the Lord, the veil is removed.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3757" class="">where</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> is present,<n id="1" /> there is <st data-num="1657" class="">freedom</st>.
And we all, with unveiled faces reflecting the glory of the Lord, are being transformed into the same image from one degree of glory to another, which is from the Lord, who is the Spirit.
